caption.p: Reagents and conditions: (a) for 1a′: N-bromosuccinimide (1.1 eq), DMF, rt, 2 h; for 1a″: NBS (2.5 eq), DMF, rt, 2 h; (b) from 1a′ to 1b: CH 3B(OH) 2 (2.0 eq), Pd(dppf) 2Cl 2, Cs 2CO 3, 1,4-dioxane, reflux, 12 h; from 1a″ to 1d: CH 3B(OH) 2 (4.0 eq), Pd(dppf) 2Cl 2, Cs 2CO 3, 1,4-dioxane, reflux, 12 h; (c) from 1b to 1c: N-bromosuccinimide (1.5 eq), DMF, rt, 2 h.
